description.title: Callbacks: two phase commit where the callback triggers a revert
description.purpose:
Deploys the error contract which implements the two phase commit approach. Transacting with the contract results in a callback to a method which has a revert that triggers - we expect this to be handled in the same way in which it would had it been done without the call back approach.
Skipped due to https://github.com/ten-protocol/ten-internal/issues/4282
